pr_title: talent solution: moving published samples into master

timeline.bodyText: Move to outside of class closing bracket (bottom of file)
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText: You can delete these since they are in the above constructor
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText: Don't need this region tag anymore
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText:
Don't catch the error messages unless there is something specific they should do.
Rather add the throw to the function definition and use the specific error messages.
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText:
Add a space above and below the request.
Code blocks can sorta follow the flow of:

Build the request
Make the request
Handle the response
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText: Can you break up the tests into individual files?
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.message: made requested changes broke down ITs

timeline.bodyText:
Can you add _beta to the end of all the region tags, since this is currently beta. Will also help with tracking when it goes GA.
// [START job_search_create_company_beta]
It'd be nice to also put all the files under:
jobs/beta
Then when they go GA we can move them to jobs/cloud-client
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText:
Does this take a long time to run?
Is it worth pre-creating a lot of these setup steps in a DO_NOT_DELETE like company / tenant id that the tests can just access?
timeline.author: nnegrey

replies.bodyText: I have decided to create pre-configured tenant and company to reduce the complexity. Once I finish it, I will re-request a review from you.
replies.author: munkhuushmgl

timeline.message: renamed packages, removed _core tags, added beta tags

timeline.bodyText: Can we inline any of these?
timeline.author: nnegrey

replies.bodyText: What do you mean by that? remove some optional params from method?
replies.author: munkhuushmgl

replies.bodyText:
Like is it really necessary in the sample for these to be passed in?
Couldn't you just put them below:
Job job =
          Job.newBuilder()
              .setCompany(companyId)
              .setRequisitionId(requisitionId)
              .setTitle("job-title")
              .setDescription("description")
              .setApplicationInfo(applicationInfo)
              .addAddresses("your-address")
              .setLanguageCode("en-US")
              .build();
replies.author: nnegrey

replies.bodyText: ahh, okay got it, will make these changes
replies.author: munkhuushmgl

timeline.bodyText:
There should be a way to do just 1.
.addAddress() instead of .addAllAddresses()
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.bodyText: Should be able to add just 1 without having to create a list
timeline.author: nnegrey

timeline.message: broke down tests and added DO_NOT_DELTE job, company, tenant
